Hi Harrison, 

Great news, we have the updated drafts ready for your review, but first, a video run-through from Heath to explain some of the new features of your custom post: https://www.loom.com/share/e8df7f1b78be433fb180262fa9b82b0c

full_threads.body:
@ricaV2 Can I please ask you to allocate this task to who may be the best positioned to assist? (Glen assisted with the initial task) Thanks! 
Hi Team,
Harrison has asked us to adjust the page styling. 

Task: Update the layout to match the current style used on: https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/services/adaptive-sports-and-leisure/

The pages to be updated are: 
https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/sexuality-service-sydney/
https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/relationship-and-sexuality-counselling-sydney/
https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/sexuality-clinic-sydney/
https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/dating-after-brain-injury/
https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/sexuality-training-and-education-for-clinicians/

I have explained the content may not fit perfectly and that is ok. Harrison will be able to adjust it as needed once the styling has been updated.

Hi Harrison, 

I just left you a VM. Can you please call me back when you have a moment?

I figured a quick call would allow us to get a firm grasp of your goals for the transfer of content. 

You can reach me on 1300 072 134 or 0421 859 547.

Hey WolfIQ,

Couple of things, I've checked the pages, it seems the page padding etc is off (I believe this is due to the overarching website styles being different between the two websites) but also we are going to be needing the content presented in a similar page style to the other Services on the website..

As I know these Services pages are templated, is there any way for us to create these pages in a similar page style to the other services on the site for consistency, while keeping the same content there? I was planning to go in and make edits but have realised as those service pages are templated I so can't do so.

Appreciate your guidance on this,

Regards,



HARRISON LEWIS​​

DIGITAL MARKETING SPECIALIST

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St

Milsons Point

Great news, we have added the pages to the Lifeworks website. You can view them below: 

https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/sexuality-service-sydney/

Please note, while the pages have been created, they haven't been added to the menu. This will allow you to review the pages and request any tweaks/changes. With your approval, we will add them to the menu.

To answer your earlier question, we completed the above work in 45 minutes.
